Complete Commercial Access Control Solutions

Professional design, installation, and service for hotels, colleges, and commercial buildings

Access Control Systems

Professional card reader systems, mobile credentials, and visitor management for Central California businesses. Complete system design, installation, and integration.

  • Card reader systems for hotels and commercial buildings
  • Mobile credential systems for modern facilities
  • Visitor management and temporary access
  • Multi-site management and centralized control
Learn More

Commercial Door Hardware

Direct vendor pricing on exit devices, locksets, door closers, and specialty hardware for commercial projects. Professional installation and full warranty support.

  • Exit devices and panic hardware
  • Commercial locksets and cylinders
  • Door closers and automatic operators
  • Specialty hardware and custom finishes
Learn More

Service & Maintenance

Keep your systems running with professional service contracts and emergency support. Preventive maintenance, emergency repairs, and system upgrades.

  • Preventive maintenance contracts
  • Emergency repair service
  • System upgrades and expansions
  • User training and support
Learn More

Industries We Serve

Hotels & Hospitality

  • Guest room access systems
  • Staff area security
  • Restaurant and amenity access
  • Master key coordination

Colleges & Universities

  • Student housing and dormitories
  • Campus building access
  • Mobile credential systems
  • Campus security integration

Commercial Buildings

  • Multi-tenant office buildings
  • Employee access and time tracking
  • Visitor management systems
  • After-hours access control

Our Service Process

1. Consultation & Assessment

We visit your facility to understand your specific security needs, traffic patterns, and integration requirements.

2. System Design

Custom system design that meets your security requirements while fitting your operational workflow and budget.

3. Professional Installation

Certified technicians handle all hardware installation, software configuration, and system testing.

4. Training & Documentation

Complete staff training on system operation, user management, and basic troubleshooting.

5. Ongoing Support

Service contracts available for maintenance, updates, and emergency support.
